snippet.title: Nobody Wants to Die | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
https://nobodywantstodie.games/ 
Experience an interactive noir story set in an alternate future of New York City in 2329. 

From indie, Polish studio, Critical Hit Games, step beyond your human shell with this first glimpse at the gameplay of Nobody Wants to Die. 

In this gripping, dystopian thriller, Detective James Karra of New York’s Mortality Department is on the hunt for a killer in a future where death is a relic of the past. Uncover evidence, manipulate time, and piece together the clues to reveal the truth as you investigate each crime scene. Brace yourself for what lies in the shadows – dark secrets of the city’s elite are waiting to be unearthed. 

Lose yourself in Nobody Wants to Die. Coming to Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC via Steam on July 17, 2024. 

PC: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1939970  
PlayStation 5: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10003635  
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9pjxgvsh37f4  
 
Follow Nobody Wants to Die socials: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nwtdgame/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/nwtdgame  
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NWtDgame 

#NobodyWantsToDie #NWTD #PLAION
